00041 Entree& Frottement_interfacial_CoviMAC::readOn(Entree& is)
00042 {

00046 
00047 void Frottement_interfacial_CoviMAC::dimensionner_blocs(matrices_t matrices, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00048 {
00049   const Champ_Face_CoviMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_CoviMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00050   if (!matrices.count(ch.le_nom().getString())) return; //rien a faire
00051   Matrice_Morse& mat = *matrices.at(ch.le_nom().getString()), mat2;
00052   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00053   const DoubleTab& inco = ch.valeurs();
00054   const IntTab& fcl = ch.fcl();
00055 
00056   /* stencil : diagonal par bloc pour les vitesses aux faces, puis chaque composante des vitesses aux elems */
00057   IntTrav stencil(0, 2);
00058   stencil.set_smart_resize(1);
00059   int i, j, e, f, k, l, N = inco.line_size(), d, db, D = dimension, nf_tot = zone.nb_faces_tot();
00060   /* faces */
00061   for (f = 0; f < zone.nb_faces(); f++) if (fcl(f, 0) < 2)
00062       {
00063         for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) stencil.append_line(N * f + k, N * f + l);
00064 // for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) for (d = 0, j = nf_tot + D * e; d < D; d++, j++)
00065 // for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) stencil.append_line(N * f + k, N * j + l);
00066       }
00067   /* elements */
00068   for (e = 0, i = nf_tot; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++) for (d = 0; d < D; d++, i++) for (db = 0, j = nf_tot + D * e; db < D; db++, j++)
00069         for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) stencil.append_line(N * i + k, N * j + l);
00070 
00071   tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(stencil);
00072   Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(inco.size_totale(), inco.size_totale(), stencil, mat2);
00073   mat.nb_colonnes() ? mat += mat2 : mat = mat2;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Frottement_interfacial_CoviMAC::ajouter_blocs(matrices_t matrices, DoubleTab& secmem, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00077 {
00078   const Champ_Face_CoviMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_CoviMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00079   Matrice_Morse *mat = matrices.count(ch.le_nom().getString()) ? matrices.at(ch.le_nom().getString()) : NULL;
00080   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00081   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &fcl = ch.fcl();
00082   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &pf = zone.porosite_face(), &ve = zone.volumes(), &vf = zone.volumes_entrelaces(), &dh_e = zone.diametre_hydraulique_elem();
00083   const DoubleTab& inco = ch.valeurs(), &pvit = ch.passe(), &mu_f = ref_cast(Op_Grad_CoviMAC_Face, ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std, equation()).operateur_gradient().valeur()).mu_f(),
00084                    &alpha = ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()).eq_masse.inconnue().passe(),
00085                     &press = ref_cast(QDM_Multiphase, equation()).pression().passe(),
00086                      &temp  = ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()).eq_energie.inconnue().passe(),
00087                       &rho   = equation().milieu().masse_volumique().passe(),
00088                        &mu    = ref_cast(Fluide_base, equation().milieu()).viscosite_dynamique().passe();
00089 
00090   int e, f, c, i, j, k, l, n, N = inco.line_size(), Np = press.line_size(), d, D = dimension, nf_tot = zone.nb_faces_tot(),
00091                               cR = (rho.dimension_tot(0) == 1), cM = (mu.dimension_tot(0) == 1), exp_res = 2;
00092   DoubleTrav a_l(N), p_l(N), T_l(N), rho_l(N), mu_l(N), dv(N, N), ddv(N, N, 4), ddv_c(4), coeff(N, N, 2); //arguments pour coeff
00093   double dv_min = 0.1, dh, a_res = 1e-2;
00094   const Frottement_interfacial_base& correlation_fi = ref_cast(Frottement_interfacial_base, correlation_.valeur());
00095 
00096   /* faces */
00097   for (f = 0; f < zone.nb_faces(); f++) if (fcl(f, 0) < 2)
00098       {
00099         for (a_l = 0, p_l = 0, T_l = 0, rho_l = 0, mu_l = 0, dh = 0, dv = dv_min, ddv = 0, c = 0; c < 2 && (e = f_e(f, c)) >= 0; c++)
00100           {
00101             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) a_l(n)   += mu_f(f, n, c) * alpha(e, n);
00102             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) p_l(n)   += mu_f(f, n, c) * press(e, n * (Np > 1));
00103             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) T_l(n)   += mu_f(f, n, c) * temp(e, n);
00104             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) rho_l(n) += mu_f(f, n, c) * rho(!cR * e, n);
00105             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) mu_l(n)  += mu_f(f, n, c) * mu(!cM * e, n);
00106             for (n = 0; n < N; n++) dh += mu_f(f, n, c) * alpha(e, n) * dh_e(e);
00107             for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++)
00108                 {
00109                   double dv_c = ch.v_norm(pvit, pvit, e, f, k, l, NULL, &ddv_c(0));
00110                   if (dv_c > dv(k, l)) for (dv(k, l) = dv_c, i = 0; i < 4; i++) ddv(k, l, i) = ddv_c(i);
00111                 }
00112           }
00113         correlation_fi.coefficient(a_l, p_l, T_l, rho_l, mu_l, dh, dv, coeff);
00114         for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
00115               coeff(k, l, j) *= 1 + (a_l(k) > 1e-8 ? std::pow(a_l(k) / a_res, -exp_res) : 0) + (a_l(l) > 1e-8 ? std::pow(a_l(l) / a_res, -exp_res) : 0);
00116 
00117         /* contributions : on prend le max entre les deux cotes */
00118         for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) if (k != l)
00119               {
00120                 double fac = pf(f) * vf(f);
00121                 /* on essaie d'impliciter coeff sans ralentir la convergence en en faisant un developpement limite autour de pvit (dans la direction d'interet seulement) */
00122                 secmem(f, k) -= fac * (coeff(k, l, 0) * (inco(f, k) - inco(f, l)) + coeff(k, l, 1) * ddv(k, l, 3) * (pvit(f, k) - pvit(f, l)) * ((inco(f, k) - inco(f, l)) - (pvit(f, k) - pvit(f, l))));
00123                 if (mat) for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) (*mat)(N * f + k, N * f + (j ? l : k)) += fac * (j ? -1 : 1) * (coeff(k, l, 0) + coeff(k, l, 1) * ddv(k, l, 3) * (pvit(f, k) - pvit(f, l)));
00124               }
00125       }
00126 
00127   /* elements */
00128   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++)
00129     {
00130       /* arguments de coeff */
00131       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) a_l(n)   = alpha(e, n);
00132       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) p_l(n)   = press(e, n * (Np > 1));
00133       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) T_l(n)   =  temp(e, n);
00134       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) rho_l(n) =   rho(!cR * e, n);
00135       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) mu_l(n)  =    mu(!cM * e, n);
00136 
00137       for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) dv(k, l) = max(ch.v_norm(pvit, pvit, e, -1, k, l, NULL, &ddv(k, l, 0)), dv_min);
00138       correlation_fi.coefficient(a_l, p_l, T_l, rho_l, mu_l, dh_e(e), dv, coeff);
00139       for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) coeff(k, l, 1) *= (dv(k, l) > dv_min); //pas de derivee si dv < dv_min
00140       for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
00141             coeff(k, l, j) *= 1 + (a_l(k) > 1e-8 ? std::pow(a_l(k) / a_res, -exp_res) : 0) + (a_l(l) > 1e-8 ? std::pow(a_l(l) / a_res, -exp_res) : 0);
00142 
00143       for (d = 0, i = nf_tot + D * e; d < D; d++, i++) for (k = 0; k < N; k++) for (l = 0; l < N; l++) if (k != l)
00144               {
00145                 double fac = pe(e) * ve(e);
00146                 /* on essaie d'impliciter coeff sans ralentir la convergence en en faisant un developpement limite autour de pvit (dans la direction d'interet seulement) */
00147                 secmem(i, k) -= fac * (coeff(k, l, 0) * (inco(i, k) - inco(i, l)) + coeff(k, l, 1) * ddv(k, l, d) * (pvit(i, k) - pvit(i, l)) * ((inco(i, k) - inco(i, l)) - (pvit(i, k) - pvit(i, l))));
00148                 if (mat) for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) (*mat)(N * i + k, N * i + l) += fac * (j ? -1 : 1) * (coeff(k, l, 0) + coeff(k, l, 1) * ddv(k, l, d) * (pvit(i, k) - pvit(i, l)));
00149               }
00150     }
00151 }
